title: Senior Python Developer
description: We are seeking an experienced Senior Python Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in Python, Django, FastAPI, and cloud technologies. Responsibilities include developing scalable web applications, designing APIs, implementing microservices architecture, and mentoring junior developers. Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, and AWS is highly preferred.

title: Frontend React Developer
description: Join our frontend team to build modern, responsive web applications using React, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks. You will work closely with UX/UI designers and backend developers to create exceptional user experiences. Must have experience with React hooks, state management (Redux/Zustand), responsive design, and API integration. Knowledge of Next.js and TailwindCSS is a plus.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We are looking for a skilled DevOps Engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. Responsibilities include automating deployment processes, monitoring system performance, implementing security best practices, and optimizing cloud costs. Required skills: AWS/Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins/GitLab CI, Terraform, and monitoring tools like Prometheus and Grafana.

title: Data Scientist
description: Exciting opportunity for a Data Scientist to work on cutting-edge machine learning projects. You will analyze large datasets, build predictive models, and deploy ML solutions to production. Strong background in Python, pandas, scikit-learn, TensorFlow/PyTorch required. Experience with statistical analysis, data visualization, and big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop) preferred.

title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
description: Join our agile startup team to build innovative web and mobile applications. We use modern JavaScript stack including Node.js, Express, React, React Native, and MongoDB. You will be involved in the entire development lifecycle from planning to deployment. Great opportunity for rapid career growth and learning cutting-edge technologies.

title: Mobile App Developer (Flutter)
description: We are seeking a talented Flutter developer to create beautiful, high-performance mobile applications for iOS and Android. Experience with Dart, Flutter framework, state management solutions (Bloc/Provider), and native platform integration required. Knowledge of Firebase, REST APIs, and app store deployment process essential.

title: Backend Engineer (Java)
description: Looking for a Backend Engineer with strong Java expertise to develop robust enterprise applications. You will work with Spring Boot, microservices architecture, and design scalable APIs. Experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL), message queues (RabbitMQ, Kafka), and cloud platforms required. Understanding of security best practices and performance optimization is crucial.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We are hiring a creative UI/UX Designer to design intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces. You will conduct user research, create wireframes and prototypes, and collaborate with development teams. Proficiency in Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, and understanding of user-centered design principles required. Portfolio showcasing mobile and web design projects essential.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Join our cybersecurity team to protect our organization's digital assets. Responsibilities include monitoring security events, conducting vulnerability assessments, implementing security controls, and responding to security incidents. Required skills: network security, penetration testing, SIEM tools, and security frameworks (ISO 27001, NIST). Relevant certifications (CISSP, CEH) preferred.

title: Product Manager
description: We are seeking an experienced Product Manager to drive product strategy and roadmap. You will work closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to deliver exceptional products. Strong analytical skills, understanding of user needs, and experience with agile methodologies required. Background in technology products and familiarity with data analytics tools preferred.

title: Junior Software Engineer
description: Great opportunity for new graduates to start their software engineering career. You will learn modern development practices, work on real projects, and receive mentorship from senior developers. Basic knowledge of programming languages (Python, Java, JavaScript) and willingness to learn required. We provide comprehensive training and career development programs.

title: Database Administrator
description: We need an experienced Database Administrator to manage and optimize our database systems. Responsibilities include database design, performance tuning, backup and recovery, and ensuring data security. Strong expertise in PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB required. Experience with database clustering, replication, and cloud database services (AWS RDS, Azure Database) preferred.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Exciting role for an ML Engineer to develop and deploy machine learning models at scale. You will work on computer vision, natural language processing, and predictive analytics projects. Strong background in Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, MLOps practices, and cloud ML services required. PhD or Master's in Computer Science, AI, or related field preferred.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description: Join our QA team to ensure high-quality software delivery. You will design test cases, perform manual and automated testing, and work closely with development teams. Experience with testing frameworks (Selenium, Jest, Cypress), API testing, and bug tracking tools required. Knowledge of CI/CD processes and performance testing is a plus.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: We are looking for a Blockchain Developer to work on decentralized applications and smart contracts. Strong understanding of blockchain technology, Solidity, Ethereum, and Web3 development required. Experience with DeFi protocols, NFTs, and layer 2 solutions preferred. This is an opportunity to work on cutting-edge blockchain projects.

title: Technical Writer
description: Seeking a Technical Writer to create clear, comprehensive documentation for our software products. You will collaborate with engineering teams to understand complex technical concepts and translate them into user-friendly documentation. Strong writing skills, attention to detail, and ability to work with APIs, SDKs, and developer tools required.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description: Join our SRE team to ensure high availability and performance of our production systems. You will design monitoring solutions, implement automation, and optimize system reliability. Strong background in Linux, scripting (Python, Bash), containerization, and observability tools required. Experience with incident management and disaster recovery preferred.

title: Game Developer (Unity)
description: Exciting opportunity for a Game Developer to create engaging mobile and PC games using Unity. You will work on game mechanics, graphics optimization, and cross-platform deployment. Strong C# programming skills, Unity experience, and understanding of game development lifecycle required. Passion for gaming and creative problem-solving essential.

title: Cloud Architect
description: We need a Cloud Architect to design and implement scalable cloud infrastructure solutions. You will work with multi-cloud environments, design migration strategies, and optimize cloud costs. Deep expertise in AWS/Azure/GCP, infrastructure as code, and cloud security required. Relevant cloud certifications and experience with enterprise architecture preferred.

title: Business Analyst
description: Looking for a Business Analyst to bridge the gap between business requirements and technical solutions. You will gather requirements, analyze business processes, and create detailed specifications. Strong analytical skills, experience with requirement gathering, and knowledge of business process modeling required. Familiarity with SQL and data analysis tools preferred.

title: React Native Developer
description: We are looking for a React Native developer to build cross-platform mobile applications. You will work with React Native, JavaScript/TypeScript, and native iOS/Android integrations. Experience with Redux, navigation libraries, and mobile app deployment required. Knowledge of performance optimization and offline functionality preferred.

title: Scrum Master
description: Join our team as a Scrum Master to facilitate agile development processes. You will coach teams, remove impediments, and ensure adherence to scrum principles. Strong understanding of agile methodologies, excellent communication skills, and experience with project management tools required. Certified Scrum Master (CSM) certification preferred.

title: Network Engineer
description: We need a Network Engineer to design, implement, and maintain our network infrastructure. Responsibilities include network troubleshooting, security implementation, and performance optimization. Strong knowledge of routing protocols, firewalls, VPNs, and network monitoring tools required. CCNA/CCNP certification preferred.

title: Embedded Systems Engineer
description: Exciting opportunity for an Embedded Systems Engineer to work on IoT and hardware projects. You will develop firmware, work with microcontrollers, and integrate sensors. Strong C/C++ programming skills, experience with ARM processors, and knowledge of communication protocols (I2C, SPI, UART) required.

title: Software Architect
description: We are seeking a Software Architect to design scalable and maintainable software systems. You will define technical standards, evaluate technologies, and guide development teams. Extensive experience in software design patterns, system architecture, and multiple programming languages required. Experience with distributed systems preferred.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: Join our digital marketing team to drive online growth and engagement. You will manage social media campaigns, SEO/SEM, email marketing, and analytics. Experience with Google Analytics, Facebook Ads, content creation, and marketing automation tools required. Knowledge of A/B testing and conversion optimization preferred.

title: System Administrator
description: We need a System Administrator to manage our IT infrastructure and server systems. Responsibilities include server maintenance, user account management, backup systems, and security compliance. Strong Linux/Windows administration skills, scripting knowledge, and experience with virtualization required.

title: Frontend Angular Developer
description: Looking for an Angular developer to build enterprise web applications. You will work with Angular, TypeScript, RxJS, and modern frontend tools. Experience with component libraries, state management, and responsive design required. Knowledge of NgRx and testing frameworks (Jasmine, Karma) preferred.

title: AI Research Engineer
description: Exciting role for an AI Research Engineer to work on cutting-edge artificial intelligence projects. You will develop novel algorithms, publish research papers, and implement AI solutions. PhD in AI/ML/CS, strong mathematical background, and experience with deep learning frameworks required.

title: Sales Engineer
description: We are hiring a Sales Engineer to bridge technical expertise with sales. You will demonstrate products, provide technical support to sales team, and work directly with clients. Strong technical background, excellent communication skills, and sales experience preferred. Knowledge of software/hardware solutions required.

title: Content Management System Developer
description: Join our team to develop and customize content management systems. You will work with WordPress, Drupal, or custom CMS solutions. Strong PHP, MySQL, HTML/CSS/JavaScript skills required. Experience with headless CMS, API development, and performance optimization preferred.

title: Penetration Tester
description: We are looking for a Penetration Tester to assess security vulnerabilities. You will conduct ethical hacking, vulnerability assessments, and security audits. Strong knowledge of penetration testing tools, network security, and web application security required. Relevant certifications (CEH, OSCP) preferred.

title: E-commerce Developer
description: Exciting opportunity to develop e-commerce platforms and online shopping solutions. You will work with Shopify, Magento, or custom e-commerce frameworks. Experience with payment gateways, inventory management, and order processing systems required. Knowledge of SEO and performance optimization preferred.

title: Graphics Designer
description: We are hiring a Graphics Designer to create visual content for digital and print media. You will design logos, brochures, websites, and marketing materials. Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, strong design sense, and portfolio showcasing diverse projects required. Experience with motion graphics preferred.

title: Backend Node.js Developer
description: Join our backend team to develop scalable Node.js applications. You will build REST APIs, work with databases, and implement microservices. Strong JavaScript/TypeScript, Express.js, and database (MongoDB, PostgreSQL) skills required. Experience with GraphQL and containerization preferred.

title: Technical Support Engineer
description: We need a Technical Support Engineer to provide excellent customer support. You will troubleshoot technical issues, create documentation, and work with development teams. Strong problem-solving skills, technical knowledge, and customer service experience required. Multi-language support preferred.

title: Vue.js Developer
description: Looking for a Vue.js developer to build modern single-page applications. You will work with Vue 3, Vuex/Pinia, and component-based architecture. Strong JavaScript, CSS, and frontend development skills required. Experience with Nuxt.js and testing frameworks preferred.

title: IT Project Manager
description: We are seeking an IT Project Manager to lead software development projects. You will manage timelines, resources, and stakeholder communication. Strong project management skills, experience with agile methodologies, and PMP certification preferred. Technical background in software development required.

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description: Exciting role for a Computer Vision Engineer to develop image processing and AI vision systems. You will work on object detection, facial recognition, and medical imaging projects. Strong background in OpenCV, Python, deep learning, and image processing algorithms required.

title: PHP Laravel Developer
description: Join our team to develop robust web applications using PHP Laravel framework. You will build APIs, integrate third-party services, and optimize database queries. Strong PHP, Laravel, MySQL skills required. Experience with Redis, Elasticsearch, and modern PHP practices preferred.

title: Automation Engineer
description: We are looking for an Automation Engineer to develop test automation and process automation solutions. You will work with Selenium, Cypress, Robot Framework, and CI/CD pipelines. Strong programming skills, testing experience, and knowledge of automation tools required.

title: Data Engineer
description: Exciting opportunity for a Data Engineer to build data pipelines and analytics infrastructure. You will work with Apache Spark, Kafka, Airflow, and cloud data platforms. Strong Python/Scala, SQL, and big data technologies experience required. Knowledge of data warehousing preferred.

title: iOS Developer (Swift)
description: We need an iOS Developer to create beautiful iPhone and iPad applications. You will work with Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, and iOS frameworks. Strong iOS development experience, App Store deployment, and knowledge of iOS design guidelines required. Experience with Core Data preferred.

title: Information Security Manager
description: Join our team as an Information Security Manager to oversee cybersecurity strategy. You will develop security policies, manage security incidents, and ensure compliance. Strong security background, management experience, and relevant certifications (CISSP, CISM) required.

title: Ruby on Rails Developer
description: Looking for a Ruby on Rails developer to build web applications and APIs. You will work with Ruby, Rails framework, and RESTful services. Strong Ruby programming skills, database knowledge, and web development experience required. Experience with Redis and background jobs preferred.

title: Salesforce Developer

title: Game Designer

description: Looking for a Digital Product Manager to drive product innovation and strategy. You will manage product roadmaps, work with cross-functional teams, and analyze market trends. Strong product management experience, analytical skills, and technical understanding required.

title: Cryptocurrency Developer

title: UX Researcher

description: Join our team as a Software Quality Engineer to ensure code quality and testing standards. You will develop testing strategies, implement automated tests, and work with development teams. Strong testing experience, automation skills, and quality assurance knowledge required.

title: Data Analyst

title: Integration Developer
